sent.orig: The approval documentation should include an approval letter and an approval book.
sent.trans: 批准文件包括批准函和批准书。

sent.orig: The current approval system works approval of 10 authorizations since the (WTO dispute) panel was established.
sent.trans: 目前的审批制度是有效的，比如，自世贸组织争端解决小组成立以来，已有10批货物获准进口。

sent.orig: Before approval to ship, parts must conform to first parts approval.
sent.trans: 在首次船运之前，产品必须符合首次承认的样品。

sent.orig: Upon approval, the Ministry of Foreign Economic Relations and Trade shall issue a certificate of approval.
sent.trans: 批准后，由对外经济贸易部发给批准证书。

sent.orig: The minute household approval should carry on before the housing project completion approval.
sent.trans: 分户验收应在住宅工程竣工验收前进行。
